it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class RemoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.RemoteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteViewInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLI, GUI

    public abstract class RemoteView
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteViewInterface
    This abstract class represent the RemoteView, implemented on each Client
    Author:
    Evandro Maddes, Francesco Masciulli
